response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a unique value that we believe exceeds expectations, and we are excited to offer it to you at an exclusive price of $995,000. We understand that its true worth may be subjective, but we are confident that this offer presents an opportunity for you to acquire something truly remarkable at a highly favorable rate. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 995000}
